content: row 25 rs 11 slip 1 knitwise tbl knit 3 cdd knit 3 purl 1 9 row 26 ws 9 slip 1 knitwise tbl knit to last stitch purl 1 9 row 27 rs 9 slip 1 knitwise tbl knit 2 cdd knit 2 purl 1 7 row 28 ws 7 slip 1 knitwise tbl purl to the end 7 row 29 rs 7 slip 1 knitwise tbl knit 1 cdd knit 1 purl 1 5 row 30 ws 5 slip 1 knitwise tbl knit to last stitch purl 1 5 row 31 rs 5 slip 1 knitwise tbl cdd purl 1 3 row 32 ws 3 slip 1 knitwise tbl purl 2 3 row 33 rs 3 slip 2 sts decrease knitwise k1 psso 1 do not fasten_off if you are using one colour fasten_off if you are using more than one colour insert a split stitch marker into the square to identify it as square a 3 magic tiles blanket © brenda brayfield 2006 updated 2020 for personal use only square b blue in graphic a a b a fig 1 fig 2 1 there is one stitch remaining on the needle from square a red circle in top left corner of yellow square fig 1 2 turn the square 45 degrees fig 2 with rs facing insert the rh needle under both loops of the slip stitch chain-like edge of square a wrap the yarn around rh needle and pull the needle through one stitch picked up and knit repeat 15 more times 17 sts 3 pick up and knit 1 stitch at the bottom corner this is a cast on stitch from bottom edge of square a 18 sts 4 turn the square to ws 5 ws cable cast on 17 sts there are now 35 sts on the needle 6 work the set-up row ws still facing knit to last stitch purl 1 7 work row 1 33 from pattern chart on page 3 to complete row 1 - repeat square b to desired width if you change your mind and want a wider blanket you can add squares later feature blanket has 9 squares per row fasten_off the last stitch and trim yarn leaving an 8 / 20 cm tail the tail will be woven in and buried in the i-cord border b b b b b b b b a square c green in graphic first square of row 2 square c starts with cable cast on followed by pick and up knit the reverse order of square b cable cast on 17 sts start with a slip knot knit into the stitch do not drop the stitch from the lh needle turn the stitch and put it back on the lh needle cable cast on until you have a total of 17 sts next step is to pick up and knit one corner stitch from the top right corner of square a and then17 sts into the slip stiches on the top
